products.title: Day & Night Effortless Royal Blue
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Capri Vision Navy Day And Night Blind
products.description: The capri vision navy day and night roller blind is designed in a classic navy hue and is great for adding the finishing touch to a coordinating scheme. The striped design includes navy polyester fabric panels and sheer voile panels so you can easily alter the natural light levels in your room. Product id: db-vrbx1849 fabric colour: navy material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium tube with steel brackets energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes capri vision navy day and night blind in blue.

products.title: Bayham, Teal - Vista Blind
products.description: Give your home something to smile about with the uplifting tone of bayham teal. The vitality and vibrancy of this unique shade allows you to imbue any room in the house with energy. Combine that with the unique vista style that allows you to add a depth and control to your window hanging like never before and you have a recipe for the perfect contemporary addition to your home. Teal is a great way of adding an energetic presence in the bathroom as you take a soak at the end of a long day.

products.title: Bayham, Navy - Vista Blind
products.description: Navy blue is a classic colour that has finally received the modern twist it deserves with the arrival of bayham navy. By combining elegant voile panels with the regal nature of navy we have created a unique aesthetic that is the perfect blend of style and substance. With the minimum of effort you can now tailor your light levels and the style of your blind in seconds. Navy works wonders when you allow it to create a theme in the master bedroom.
